name: Pet Laundry Day
description:
"Pet Laundry Day" is FREE Game for all. Free to Download & PLAY.
Pet Laundry is not an ordinary laundry. It will give you word best laundry service.

This Learn you how to work in laundry.
- Work with washing machine for White & colorful clothes.
- How to hanging wet clothes out side.
- iron clothe & put it to side for home delivery.

Play lot's of FREE Games with us.
